original_text: I will set my face against you so that you will be defeated by your enemies; those who hate you will rule over you, and you will flee even when no one is pursuing you.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 치리니 너희가 너희의 대적에게 패할 것이요 너희를 미워하는 자가 너희를 다스릴 것이며 너희는 쫓는 자가 없어도 도망하리라

sentences.original_text: I will set my face against you
so that you will be defeated by your enemies
those who hate you will rule over you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 미워하는 자들이 너희를 다스릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: even when no one is pursuing you
